remarks: If four real numbers are less than a fifth real number, the sum of the four real numbers is less then four times the fifth real number. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
lt4addmuld.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
lt4addmuld.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
lt4addmuld.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
lt4addmuld.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. RR ) $.
lt4addmuld.e $e |- ( ph -> E e. RR ) $.
lt4addmuld.alte $e |- ( ph -> A < E ) $.
lt4addmuld.blte $e |- ( ph -> B < E ) $.
lt4addmuld.clte $e |- ( ph -> C < E ) $.
lt4addmuld.dlte $e |- ( ph -> D < E ) $.
lt4addmuld $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ( A + B ) + C ) + D ) < ( 4 x. E ) ) $.
